alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 6:01AM EDT until June 15 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Eastern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 645 AM EDT. * At 601 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morgan to 9 miles northeast of Colquitt to near Donalsonville, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Newton, Morgan, Albany, Putney, Camilla, Pelham, Arlington, Baconton, Leary, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Douglasville, Sale City, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Radium Springs and Lester. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell
